definition: to work extra hours/to do overtime
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
to write a flawless essay in one go (idiom)/to be quick-witted and skilled at writing compositions

sentences.english: W:You want some cream in the coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你要在咖啡里加點奶油嗎？

sentences.english: If you salt the vegetables with a little onion salt, they will taste better.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在蔬菜里加點蔥頭鹽，就會更好喫一些。

sentences.english: The machine works fine if you oil it.
sentences.chinese: 只要你給它加點油，機器就會運轉得很好。

sentences.english: Bear bile can also be added to some sugar water that will be made into healthy oral solution.
sentences.chinese: 還能加點糖水製成一種保健口服液。

sentences.english: One more effort- to get to the top.
sentences.chinese: 再加點油，你就沒關係到達頂端了。

sentences.english: Winter many person is fond of a goulash , had better in adding a radish among them.
sentences.chinese: 冬季很多人喜歡燉牛肉，最好在其中加點蘿蔔。

sentences.english: This meat should be seasoned with salt and mustard.
sentences.chinese: 這肉裏應該加點鹽和芥末調味。

sentences.english: It is too salty, Would you please add some water to the soup?
sentences.chinese: 這湯太鹹了，你能往裏面加點水嗎？

sentences.english: You can even add drops of hand-wash gel to the water and stir it, before dipping your hands in it.
sentences.chinese: 在泡手前，在裏邊加點洗手液然後攪一攪當然更好。

sentences.english: Add more salt to the soup and the soup will taste better.
sentences.chinese: 向湯裏再加點鹽，湯的味道就會更好。

sentences.english: Do you want to put some jelly on the bread?
sentences.chinese: 你要在麪包上加點啫喱嗎？

sentences.english: Rather than pouring yourself a glass of fruit juice, try adding skim milk to your morning routine.
sentences.chinese: 與其喝果汁，不如試着在你的早餐你加點脫脂牛奶吧。

sentences.english: You need to add more cornstarch .
sentences.chinese: 你要多加點玉米澱粉纔行。

sentences.english: We must oil this door to stop it creaking.
Put some sticks on the fire.
With cream and just a pinch of sugar, please.

definition: plain cooked rice/rice with nothing to go with it
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
